commit.message: Rewrite plan UI and enhance Newick support
feat: enhance quiet progress telemetry and release 0.2.2
feat: add dedicated run settings screen and runtime configs
feat(prompt): make prepare wizard layout responsive
feat: improve cactus-prepare UX and templates

feat: improve cactus-prepare onboarding UX

- persist recent commands and allow quick selection from history
- add parameter wizard and template picker to simplify command entry
- introduce example/custom template management for generating standard cactus-prepare invocations

feat: responsive Environment Summary & Plan Overview; add RaMAx options editor

  - UI: Environment Summary rendered as Rich Panel with auto-resize; Plan Overview
    switched to Panel/Table (expand + overflow=fold) to avoid overflow/misalignment
    on narrow terminals
  - UI: Added RaMAx options editor for plan.global_ramax_opts and round.ramax_opts;
    supports add/remove and is integrated into the E-key edit flow; previews auto-append
    options
  - Detect: Report cactus path/version; version prefers `pip show cactus | grep -i ^Version`
    with fallback to `python -m pip show cactus`; filter NVML noise lines
  - CSS: Removed unsupported `gap`; use margins for spacing
  - CLI: Stop echoing the full `cactus-prepare` command to reduce noise
  - Docs: Update CHANGELOG; release 0.2.0 (2025-10-28)
feat: add pre-run cleanup prompt and plan-level verbose controls
docs: add 0.1.0 release notes and version manifest
feat: add tree-based subtree switching and filtered execution for 0.1 release
feat: add tree-based subtree switching and filtered execution for 0.1 release
feat: Add core functionality for CAX workflow integration
